A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Edited from 3 to 1 star after watching a second time. I did enjoy the Rifftrax version though!\n\nI was for sure entertained.  As a deep rooted fan of the franchise my expectations were likely unreasonably high.  I'm having trouble with the dimensionality of Kylo (I hear other fans think he is the most complex villain of the franchise but that doesn't say much then about villains of the franchise).  I'm having a lot of trouble emotionally attaching to many of the characters (Rey\, Finn\, Rose\, Kylo\, etc)...Maybe I fear I'm just growing out of Star Wars all these years.
